**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 72 All types of creatures can have their corpses preserved and rise as [mummies](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=74).
  • Add the [mummy](/Traits.aspx?ID=228) and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) traits.
  • Add the [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) language.
  • Add the following immunities: [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
  • Add weakness to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), with a value depending on the creature's level.
  • Add the following abilities.
    **[Darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)**
    **[Negative Healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)**
    **Lesser Despair** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 30 feet. Living creatures of the mummy creature's level or lower are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) while in its despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave.
